snippet: A business near the Grand Canyon National Park has offered $25,000 to reopen parts of the park, and North Carolina has reminded fall foliage tourists that visitor center restrooms along the Blue Ridge Parkway will not be open.
abstract: A business near the Grand Canyon National Park has offered $25,000 to reopen parts of the park, and North Carolina has reminded fall foliage tourists that visitor center restrooms along the Blue Ridge Parkway will not be open.

headline.main: Lodge Owner Offers $25,000 to Reopen Grand Canyon
